RT @paulhaenle Good list @jimsciutto!  I would add 6. NK willingness to provide a detailed declaration of its nuclear programs 7. Importance of a robust verification process 8. On scope, does denuc include NK missiles, chemical and bio weapons programs https://twitter.com/jimsciutto/status/1006370096556773376 QT @jimsciutto Key things to look for in any joint statement:
1- the word denuclearization 
2- timeline for denuclearization 
3- scope of denuclearization, that is, for NK or entire peninsula 
4- definition or details of denuclearization 
5- plans for another summit
